description: Reports emerge of secretive meetings among high-ranking officials, indicating internal divisions within the Directorate and Council.
Leaked documents from within the Directorate expose rival plans for the BCI, escalating tensions among factions.
Public demonstrations erupt, demanding transparency and clarity on the BCI's future amid growing political infighting.
High-ranking Council members hold a confidential meeting to discuss potential successors for Halden's role in BCI management.
Rumors spread of multiple factions vying for control of the system, stoking fears and sparking scattered protests across Stenograd.
Key advisors in the Directorate form alliances, drafting competing strategies for assuming control over the BCI.
The internal struggle leads to accidental data loss, resulting in hundreds of BCI scores being temporarily inaccessible.
